languages.text: "Я не поведаю тебе этого, так что ты умрешь во тьме незнания. Иронично, что твой хозяин даже не потрудился сообщить, во имя чего ты идешь на смерть. И я не подслащу сию отравленную чашу".

"I will keep this from you so that you may perish in the darkness of ignorance. Pathetic. Your master didn't even tell you the reason why he sent you to face your death. And neither will I make this poisoned cup any easier to drink."
languages.original_text: "Я не поведаю тебе этого, так что ты умрешь во тьме незнания. Иронично, что твой хозяин даже не потрудился сообщить, во имя чего ты идешь на смерть. И я не подслащу сию отравленную чашу".

traits.locale_text: "I will keep this from you so that you may perish in the darkness of ignorance. Pathetic. Your master didn't even tell you the reason why he sent you to face your death. And neither will I make this poisoned cup any easier to drink."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: “我不会告诉你答案，我会让你在无知的黑暗中丧命。真是可悲，你的主人甚至没有告诉你，他为什么会派你来这里送死。但即便如此，我也不打算让这杯鸩酒变得更容易下咽。”
languages.original_text: "I will keep this from you so that you may perish in the darkness of ignorance. Pathetic. Your master didn't even tell you the reason why he sent you to face your death. And neither will I make this poisoned cup any easier to drink."

traits.locale_text: “我不会告诉你答案，我会让你在无知的黑暗中丧命。真是可悲，你的主人甚至没有告诉你，他为什么会派你来这里送死。但即便如此，我也不打算让这杯鸩酒变得更容易下咽。”
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: « Je ne vous le dirai pas, pour que vous mouriez dans les ténèbres de l'ignorance. Quelle honte. Votre maître ne vous a même pas dit pourquoi il vous envoyait à la mort, et ne comptez pas sur moi pour vous aider à ingurgiter ce terrible poison. »
languages.original_text: "I will keep this from you so that you may perish in the darkness of ignorance. Pathetic. Your master didn't even tell you the reason why he sent you to face your death. And neither will I make this poisoned cup any easier to drink."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous le dirai pas, pour que vous mouriez dans les ténèbres de l'ignorance. Quelle honte. Votre maître ne vous a même pas dit pourquoi il vous envoyait à la mort, et ne comptez pas sur moi pour vous aider à ingurgiter ce terrible poison. »
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: 「貴様が無知の闇の中で滅びるためにも、このことは秘密にしておこう。哀れなものだ。お前の主人はお前を死に向かわせた理由さえも話さなかったのか。俺もお前の希望に応えるようなことはしない」
languages.original_text: "I will keep this from you so that you may perish in the darkness of ignorance. Pathetic. Your master didn't even tell you the reason why he sent you to face your death. And neither will I make this poisoned cup any easier to drink."

traits.locale_text: 「貴様が無知の闇の中で滅びるためにも、このことは秘密にしておこう。哀れなものだ。お前の主人はお前を死に向かわせた理由さえも話さなかったのか。俺もお前の希望に応えるようなことはしない」
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: «No revelaré nada para que mueras en la oscuridad de la ignorancia. Es patético. Tu amo ni siquiera te ha dicho por qué te envía a enfrentarte a tu final. Pues yo tampoco aligeraré tu carga».
languages.original_text: "I will keep this from you so that you may perish in the darkness of ignorance. Pathetic. Your master didn't even tell you the reason why he sent you to face your death. And neither will I make this poisoned cup any easier to drink."

traits.locale_text: «No revelaré nada para que mueras en la oscuridad de la ignorancia. Es patético. Tu amo ni siquiera te ha dicho por qué te envía a enfrentarte a tu final. Pues yo tampoco aligeraré tu carga».
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: "Ich werde Euch das vorenthalten, auf dass Ihr in der Dunkelheit des Unwissens verendet. Erbärmlich. Euer Meister hat Euch nicht einmal einen Grund dafür genannt, dass er Euch in den Tod schickt. Und auch ich werde es Euch nicht leichter machen, diesen vergifteten Kelch zu leeren."
languages.original_text: "I will keep this from you so that you may perish in the darkness of ignorance. Pathetic. Your master didn't even tell you the reason why he sent you to face your death. And neither will I make this poisoned cup any easier to drink."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde Euch das vorenthalten, auf dass Ihr in der Dunkelheit des Unwissens verendet. Erbärmlich. Euer Meister hat Euch nicht einmal einen Grund dafür genannt, dass er Euch in den Tod schickt. Und auch ich werde es Euch nicht leichter machen, diesen vergifteten Kelch zu leeren."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: "Bunu sana söylemeyeceğim, cehaletinin karanlığında telef olup gideceksin. Ne kadar acınası... Efendin, seni neden ölümüne gönderdiğini dahi söylemedi. Benim de bu kadehteki zehri içişini kolaylaştırmaya niyetim yok."
languages.original_text: "I will keep this from you so that you may perish in the darkness of ignorance. Pathetic. Your master didn't even tell you the reason why he sent you to face your death. And neither will I make this poisoned cup any easier to drink."
